examples: The bride's wedding dress is white.
A white blouse will show the blood.
They served white rice with the chicken curry.
After the surgery, his face was as white as a sheet.
After the car accident, her face was as white as a ghost.
words.defineEn: having the color that is the lightest, like snow
words.defineVi: có màu nhạt nhất, như tuyết

examples: He looked like he had been coated with Alabaster, sprinkled with baby powder.
words.defineEn: a very light white
words.defineVi: một màu trắng rất nhạt

words.defineEn: a soft off-white color with a warm undertone, resembling the aged or weathered look of antique furniture

examples: The resident pianist will be tickling the ivories.
I think you live in an ivory tower.
The book was written by some college professor who's spent her entire professional life in an ivory tower.
You're completely out of touch - it's time to come out of your ivory tower and see what's going on in the real world!
Instead of hiring the brightest scientists and locking them in an ivory tower with like-minded people, the organization strives to embrace collaboration and a full-stack scope of solutions.
words.defineEn: a shade of white the color of bleached bones
words.defineVi: một bóng trắng màu của xương tẩy trắng

examples: That's right, you can get a yeast infection in your belly button, which can lead to itching and redness, and cause a clear or off-white discharge to leak out, which almost looks like cottage cheese.
words.defineEn: having a white color with gray or yellow undertones

words.defineEn: a pale yellow color resembling the color of ripe corn silk, often used to describe a warm, light yellowish hue

words.defineEn: a pale beige or off-white color, often used to represent the average color of the universe
words.defineVi: màu be nhạt hoặc trắng nhạt, thường được sử dụng để thể hiện màu trung bình của vũ trụ

words.defineVi: màu vàng xám nhạt hoặc màu kem, được đặt tên theo bộ lông nhạt của thỏ Isabella

examples: This is a Magnolia tree, one of the oldest flowering plant species still around today.
Eventually, they took on more familiar forms, as the world saw its first forests of magnolias, oaks, and beech trees.
66 million years ago, an animal about the size of a rat was hunting down insects and searching for fruit among the evergreen leaves of ancient relatives of the magnolia.
words.defineEn: a creamy white color, often with warm undertones, resembling the color of the flowers of the magnolia tree

examples: Finally, the skin is now parchment.
Parchment paper will separate naturally in the oil.
Early in the 20th century, designers incorporated parchment into high-end furniture and decor, and it is still used for that today.
Parchment as a product almost hasn't survived.
you can use as a parchment paper.
words.defineEn: a pale, yellowish-white color that resembles the color of aged parchment paper
words.defineVi: một màu trắng nhạt, hơi vàng giống như màu của giấy da lâu năm

examples: The resident pianist will be tickling the ivories.

examples: I collected seashells as souvenirs from the beautiful island.

Her jawbone contained three tooth-shaped pieces of seashell embedded into the bone in spots where three of her natural teeth were missing.

examples: Vanilla custard is a popular choice for filling pastries and cream puffs.
He decorated a vanilla cake with colorful sprinkles for a festive celebration.
The cranberry pie at the bakery is absolutely delicious, especially with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
My favorite summer dessert is a blackberry cobbler topped with vanilla ice cream.
I love eating a scoop of vanilla ice cream on a hot summer day.
words.defineEn: a warm, creamy white color reminiscent of the sweet, aromatic flavor of vanilla beans
words.defineVi: một màu trắng kem ấm áp gợi nhớ đến hương thơm ngọt ngào của đậu vani

words.defineEn: a pale, almost ethereal shade of white that evokes a sense of otherworldliness or subtle mystery
words.defineVi: một màu trắng nhạt, gần như thanh tao gợi lên cảm giác về một thế giới khác hoặc bí ẩn tinh tế

words.defineEn: a light, pale yellow color reminiscent of the delicate, airy texture of chiffon fabric and the vibrant hue of fresh lemons

examples: The chef drizzled cream over the warm apple pie.

examples: - It kind of tastes milky.

words.defineEn: like milk in color; white and pale
words.defineVi: giống màu sữa; trắng và nhợt nhạt

words.defineEn: a pure, crisp white color that is clean and bright, often associated with the minimalist aesthetic of Dutch design

examples: I was always on eggshells when my family came to stay.
When he's tired we spend the day treading on eggshells as he becomes stubborn and grumpy.
If you're sick you don't want people treating you differently, and you really don't want people walking on eggshells around you.
One cave in the Grand Canyon, for example, turned up not only condor bones but also eggshell fragments and the remains of horses, bison, mammoths, camels, and an extinct mountain goat.
While DDT isn’t lethal to adult falcons, it weakens the eggshells they produce.
words.defineEn: a soft, pale off-white color that resembles the color of the interior of an eggshell
words.defineVi: một màu trắng nhạt, mềm mại giống như màu của phần bên trong vỏ trứng
